text: GameRankings was a gaming review website. The website received reviews from other publications and gave an average rating. It had over 315,000 articles relating to more than 14,500 video games. GameRankings was owned by CBS Interactive. Similar websites include GameStats, Metacritic, MobyGames, and TopTenReviews. == Shutdown == In late 2019, GameRankings was shutting down, with every link being moved to Metacritic. ==References== ==Other websites== *GameRankings *"High Scores Matter To Game Makers, Too" , The Wall Street Journal, September 20, 2007. Category:1999 establishments Category:Internet culture
title: GameRankings
